data.text: Adama ɠɛni ga Sɛte kɛɛɠɛ, Sɛte ɠɛ ga Enɔse kɛɛɠɛ,
Enɔse ɠɛ ga Kenan kɛɛɠɛ, Kenan ɠɛ ga Maɠalaleyɛle kɛɛɠɛ, Maɠalaleyɛle ɠɛ ga Yelɛde kɛɛɠɛ,
Yelɛde ɠɛ ga Enɔke kɛɛɠɛ, Enɔke ɠɛ ga Matuzalɛme kɛɛɠɛ, Matuzalɛme ɠɛ ga Lemɛke kɛɛɠɛ,
Lemɛke ɠɛ ga Nowe kɛɛɠɛ, Nowe ɠɛ ga Sɛme, Same ta Zafɛte ti-ɠɛɛ.
Zafɛte mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Gomɛɛl, Magɔge, Madayi, Yavan, Tuɓale, Mesɛke ta Tilase.
Gomɛɛl mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Asakenaze, Difate, ta Togaalema.
Yavan mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Elisa, Taalasise, Kitime, ta Lodanime.
Same mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Kuse, Miselayime, Pute, ta Kanaan.
Kuse mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Seɓa, Ɠavila, Saɓata, Layema, ta Saɓeteka. Layema mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Saɓa ta Dedan.
Kuse Nimelɔde zɔlɔɔni, naa ɠa é ɠɛɛni ga zɛbɛsu nu wola mɔungi zooi ɠa.
Miselayime mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Lude nuiti, Aname nuiti, Leɠaɓe nuiti, Nafatu nuiti,
Patɔlɔse nuiti, Kasulu nuiti, ta Kafatɔɔl nuiti. (Kasulu nui naati ka Filisiti nuiti kulaai ti zu.)
Kanaan ná-doun zunu mɔungi é sɔlɔɔni, naa ɠa é ɠɛni ga Sidɔn, naa ʋolu gelei ɠɛ ga Ɠɛte.
Kanaan mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Yeɓuse nuiti, Amool nuiti, Giilegase nuiti,
Ɠeve nuiti, Aaleke nuiti, Sine nuiti,
Aalevade nuiti, Semaal nuiti, ta Ɠamate nuiti.
Sɛme mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Elame, Asuul, Aalapakasade, Lude, ta Alame. Alame mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Use, Ɠule, Getɛɛl ta Mesɛke.
Aalapakasade Sela zɔlɔɔni, ta Sela Eɓɛɛl zɔlɔɔni.
Eɓɛɛl zunu loun felegɔ zɔlɔɔni: Gilagi laaseigi ɠɛni ga Pelɛge, tɔɔzei ná-siɛgi zu ɠa zooi ɠa nuɓusɛiti zeeɠaaɠwɛɛni la, ta kɛɛɠɛloin laaseigi ɠɛni ga Yoketan.
Yoketan mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Alamodade, Selɛfe, Ɠasaalemavɛte, Yela,
Ɠadolame, Uzale, Dikila,
Eɓale, Aɓimayɛle, Saɓa,
Wofiil, Ɠavila ta Yoɓaɓe. Niima nuiti pɛ ti ɠɛni ga Yoketan mavofodaiti.
Sɛme ɠa é ɠɛni ga Aalapakasade kɛɛɠɛ, Aalapakasade ɠɛ ga Sela kɛɛɠɛ,
Sela ɠɛ ga Eɓɛɛl kɛɛɠɛ, Eɓɛɛl ɠɛ ga Pelɛge kɛɛɠɛ, Pelɛge ɠɛ ga Leyu kɛɛɠɛ,
Leyu ɠɛ ga Seluge kɛɛɠɛ, Seluge ɠɛ ga Naɠɔɔl kɛɛɠɛ, Naɠɔɔl ɠɛ ga Tela kɛɛɠɛ,
Tela ɠɛ ga Abalame kɛɛɠɛ nii é ga Abalaame.
Abalaame ná-dointi ti ɠɛni ga: Izaake ta Isemayɛle.
Wɛlɛ ti-mavofodaiti ba: Neɓayɔte, Isemayɛle ná-doun zunu mɔungi, ta Kedaal, Adaɓeyɛle, Miɓisame,
Misema, Duma, Masa, Ɠadade, Tema,
Yetuul, Nafise ta Kedema. Naati ka ti ɠɛni ga Isemayɛle ná-doun zunuiti.
Ketula Abalaame anzai nii é la ɠɛni vuluni ga zɔiti kɛʋele, naa ná-dointi ti ɠɛni ga: Zimelan, Yokesan, Medan, Madiyan, Yisiɓake, ta Suwa. Yokesan ná-dointi ti ɠɛni ga: Saɓa ta Dedan.
Madiyan mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Efa, Efɛɛl, Enɔke, Aɓida ta Eledaa. Niima nuiti pɛ ti ɠɛni ga Ketula mavofodaiti.
Abalaame ná-doun zunui ɠɛni ga Izaake, Izaake ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛ ga Ezawu ta Izilayɛle.
Ezawu ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Elifaze, Leyuwɛle, Yeyuse, Yalame ta Kola.
Elifaze ná-dointi ti ɠɛni ga: Teman, Womaal, Sefi, Gayetame, Kenaze, Timina, ta Amalɛke.
Leyuwɛle ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Naɠate, Zela, Sama ta Miza.
Seyiil mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Lotan, Sɔɓale, Siɓeyon, Ana, Dison, Esɛɛl, Disan.
Lotan mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Woli ta Womame. Lotan baazeelai laaseigi ɠɛni ga: Timina.
Sɔɓale mavofodaiti ti ɠɛni ga: Aliyan, Manaɠate, Eɓale, Sefi, ta Woname. Siɓeyon ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Aya ta Ana.
Ana ná-doun zunui ɠɛni ga: Dison. Dison ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga niiti: Amalan, Eseɓan, Yitilan ta Kelan.
Esɛɛl ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Ɓiliɠan, Zaavan ta Yaakan. Disan ná-doun zunuiti ti ɠɛni ga: Use ta Alan.
Masagiti daaseigiti kaa, niiti ti masadai ɠɛɛni Edɔme yooi unda, aisa masa ge ʋa zei Izilayɛle unda: Ɓeyɔɔl ná-doun zunui Ɓela, ná-taai laaseigi ɠɛni ga Dinaɓa.
Ɓela zaai ma, Ɓosela nui Zela ná-doun zunui Yoɓaɓe masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu.
Yoɓaɓe zaai ma, Teman nuiti ta-you zu nui Ɠusame masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu.
Ɠusame zaai ma, Ɓedade ná-doun zunui Ɠadade masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu. Tɔun ka é vɔnini Madiyan nuiti ma Moaɓe yooi zu. Ná-taai laaseigi ɠɛni ga Avite.
Ɠadade zaai ma, Maseleka nui Samala masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu.
Samala zaai ma, Sayile masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu. É ɠɛni ga Leɠoɓɔte taa wolai zunu, ziɛ wolai laaʋɛ.
Sayile zaai ma, Akaɓɔɔl ná-doun zunui Ɓaale-Ɠanan masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu.
Ɓaale-Ɠanan zaai ma, Ɠadade masadai ɠɛɛni potogi zu. Ná-taai laaseigi ɠɛni ga Pau. Matelede ná-doun anzanui ɠa é ɠɛni ga anzai, daaseigi ɠɛni ga Meɠetaɓeyɛle, Mezaɠaɓe ná-dounloin.
Ɠadade zaai ma, pɛlɛyeɠe ɠundiɠii tanigaa ɠa ti ɠɛni Edɔme unda, ti-laaseigiti kaa: Timina, Alava, Yetete,
Woɠoliɓama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaze, Teman, Miɓisaal,
Magadiyɛle ta Iilame. Edɔme ɠundiɠiiti kana.
